alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WESTERN HARRISON AND SOUTHEASTERN HANCOCK COUNTIES THROUGH 200 PM CDT... At 130 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Diamondhead, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead, Kiln, Shoreline Park, Lyman, and Gulfport Airport. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 9 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison
